meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Leszek Pawlowicz Tom Cubbage Brad Rutter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6837.

div.div: Battle of the Decades semifinal game 2.

td.p: Leszek Pawlowicz, a shovel bum from Flagstaff, Arizona
Tom Cubbage, an attorney from Washington, D.C.
Brad Rutter, an actor and producer from Hollywood, California

tr.td: WON THE BATTLE, LOST THE WAR
ACTRESSES
RECENT NOVELS
(Alex: We want you to give us the cliché we've reworded in...)
AVOIDING THE CLICHÉ
POLICE & FIREFIGHTERS
FIRST RESPONSES
(Alex: These are responses we've never tried to go for in Jeopardy! history.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_4', 'clue_J_2_4_stuck', '(Alex: [Before Brad\'s wager] And if I remember correctly, and this might be of some significance, in yesterday\'s semifinal, Ken had $4,400 when he hit the Daily Double in the Jeopardy! Round.)
(Brad: He did, did he?)
(Alex: He did.)
[Audience laughs]
(Alex: And he bet it all.)
(Brad: Let\'s make it a True Daily Double.)

Vivien Leigh

Brad
')

tr.td: Brad
Tom
Leszek
SHIP SHAPE
STATE FACTS
ALL KINDS OF MUSIC
"DEC"-ADES
LIBRARIES
(Alex: The science and technology magazine.)
